---
title: "papers-with-dag"
---

This is a Quarto website.

```{r}
dag <- dagitty::dagitty("dag {
    y <- x <- z1 <- v -> z2 -> y
    z1 <- w1 <-> w2 -> z2
    x <- w1 -> y
    x <- w2 -> y
    x [exposure]
    y [outcome]
  }")

dagitty::adjustmentSets(dag)
tidy_dag <- ggdag::tidy_dagitty(dag)
ggdag::ggdag(tidy_dag) +
  ggdag::theme_dag()
```
